mapper.select: SELECT id, room_id, publisher_id, player_id, state, stream_url, created_datetime, updated_datetime FROM room_users WHERE id = #{value}

SELECT room_users.id, room_users.room_id as roomId, room_users.publisher_id as publisherId, room_users.player_id as playerId, room_users.state, stream_url, room_users.created_datetime as createdDatetime, room_users.updated_datetime as updatedDatetime, users.name FROM room_users JOIN users ON room_users.player_id = users.id WHERE room_id = #{value} ORDER BY room_users.player_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_users ( id, room_id, publisher_id, player_id, state, stream_url, created_datetime, updated_datetime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{roomId}, #{publisherId}, #{playerId}, #{state}, #{streamUrl}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, room_id, publisher_id, player_id, state, stream_url, created_datetime, updated_datetime FROM room_users WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND player_id = #{playerId}
